casebody.data:
E. Haffner FOURNIER, et al., petitioners,
v.
UNITED STATES; Richard E. Dahlberg and Heather H. Dahlberg, petitioners,
v.
United States; John E. Kettle, Anne R. Kettle, Raymond W. Weidemann, Joan C. Weidemann, James N. Ivy, and Leah Page Ivy, petitioners,
v.
United States; John Y. Glass, Josephine J. Glass, Thomas R. Lumpkin, Jean P. Lumpkin, James R. Rehak, and Joann M. Rehak, petitioners,
v.
United States; and Lawrence R. McCann, Cecil McCann, James H. Epps, and Arbelia Epps, petitioners,
v.
United States. No. 12-1105. Supreme Court of the United States July 22, 2013.

Former decision, 133 S.Ct. 2035 .

Petition for rehearing denied.
